name: Monotony Chic album
description: Debut full-length 10 track album. Produced by Eskil Lovstrom (Refused, Poison The Well, Hell Is For Heroes) in Sweden. 6 panel digipack with booklet, designed by Toby Hook Tracklisting: Siren Song Allure a Hore Lipstick Vulture The Victim Enola Magister Navis Vacancy Ape Judgement Bespoke Syncope (Muzzle) Cacophony of Silence Read more info and reviews at www.weareshapes.tumblr.com/monotony-chic

name: The Pasture, The Oil 6 track EP
description:
6 track EP released through Big Scary Monsters.

Tracklisting:

01. Trampled By A Horse
02. The Escapologist
03. Our Children's Children
04. The Moon Is Bright, But Coned Off
05. Such Stoics
06. You Butcher 

Rock Sound - 8/10
Die Shellsuit Die - 8/10
Punktastic.com - 3.5/5
2forward4back - 8/10

Comes in a lovley card digi pack and awesome artwork from Mr Gordo.

name: The Pasture, The Oil Remixes
description:
New remix release featuring all 6 tracks of 2009's The Pasture, The Oil EP.

Trampled By A Horse - Please Will
The Escapologist - Greatest Remix
Our Children's Children - VS // YOUTHCLUB
The Moon Is Bright, But Coned Off - Marcus Sadler
Such Stoics - Jarvis Talons
You Butcher - MTBRD

Available from 4th October, so orders will be dispatched that day.

Limited Edition of 100 only!

name: Get Your Learn On EP
description:
Shapes debut EP ‘Get YOur Learn On’

	Released on Godmonkey Recordings.

	6 tracks, including exclusive remix by Please Will:

	You’ve Made Your Bed Now Eat It

	Dreams In Twisted Fuselage

	Retreat, Attack!

	Everything More Out Of Tune Than Everything Else

	Yer Cold Bastard

	Get Your Remix On (Please Will remix)

name: Holy Monsters split 10" Vinyl
description:
Split 10" Vinyl released through Holy Roar and Big Scary Monsters, featuring the following exclusive tracks:

A1. Brontide - Bob Munden
A2. The Tupolev Ghost - Omar Coming
B1. Shapes - The Talisman
B2. Holy State - Anechoic Chamber Maid

PLUS comes with 20 track download code too!!

Beautiful translusent green 10" vinyl, limited to 250 copies.
